entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 overnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
